item.title: Step Up Connect — Youth Growth Ecosystem
item.description:
The Vision: Something Big in Development

Step Up Connect is currently in active development and is poised to become a major ecosystem for youth empowerment. It’s more than just a job board; it’s a multi-faceted platform designed to scale across regions, connecting the next generation of professionals to a global economy.

Our Solution

Young professionals often face a fragmented landscape when looking for jobs, mentorship, and skills development. There was a need for a unified “ecosystem” that not only provides resources but also uses AI to personalize the experience.

Our Solution

Step Up Connect is a “static-first” but highly dynamic platform. It uses Hugo for a fast, SEO-optimized frontend while leveraging a FastAPI backend for real-time features like AI-driven career advice and secure payments.

Technical Architecture

  • Frontend: Hugo with the Blowfish theme for speed and accessibility.
  • API Layer: FastAPI with JWT authentication and role-based access control.
  • AI Integration: Abstracted connectors for OpenAI and Google Gemini to generate job and skill recommendations.
  • Payments: Integrated Flutterwave for secure transactions and monetized mentorship tiers.
  • Infra: Fully containerized with Docker, including Redis for caching and PostgreSQL for data persistence.

Key Features

  • AI Digest — Personalized career and skill updates generated by LLMs.
  • E-Learning Integration — Direct links to high-value skill paths and courses.
  • Mentorship Marketplace — Connecting experienced leaders with rising talent.
  • Payments Ready — Secure billing for premium features and consulting.

Results

  • Global reach — Multilingual support out of the box.
  • Exceptional performance — Near-instant load times thanks to static-first architecture.
  • Scalable backend — Handles high-concurrency AI requests efficiently.

Tech Stack

Hugo FastAPI Python Docker Flutterwave OpenAI PostgreSQL

item.title: Kenya Scraper Platform — Automated Data Pipeline
item.description:
The Challenge

A client needed structured business data from thousands of online sources across Kenya. Manual collection was impractical — they needed an automated, scalable pipeline that could handle anti-bot protections, rate limiting, and data normalization.

Our Solution

We built the Kenya Scraper Platform, a production-grade data pipeline using FastAPI for the API layer, Playwright for browser automation, and Celery for distributed task processing.

Technical Architecture

  • API Layer: FastAPI with async endpoints for job management
  • Scraping Engine: Playwright with stealth plugins, proxy rotation, and retry logic
  • Task Queue: Celery with Redis broker for distributed scraping jobs
  • Storage: PostgreSQL with optimized schemas for large datasets
  • Monitoring: Real-time job status tracking and error reporting

Key Features

  • Distributed Scraping — Celery workers process multiple sites concurrently
  • Anti-Detection — Stealth browser profiles, randomized timing, proxy rotation
  • Data Normalization — Raw HTML → structured JSON with validation
  • Job Management — REST API for creating, monitoring, and managing scrape jobs
  • Export Pipeline — CSV, JSON, and direct database insertion

Results

  • 10,000+ records collected per day
  • 99.2% scraping success rate
  • Zero IP bans with proxy rotation strategy

Tech Stack

FastAPI Playwright Celery Redis PostgreSQL Docker

item.title: n8n Workflow Collection — Business Automation
item.description:
Our Solution: Automation for Kenyan Businesses

We specialize in helping Kenyan businesses bridge the digital divide by implementing AI-driven automations. Our n8n Workflow Collection serves as the foundation for these services, allowing us to rapidly deploy proven automation patterns for local enterprises that haven’t yet reached their full operational potential.

Helping You Leverage AI Operations

Many businesses in the region are yet to fully integrate AI into their daily workflows. We provide:

  • Custom n8n Integrations for local and global APIs.
  • AI-Driven Operations to automate repetitive tasks like invoicing, lead generation, and customer support.
  • Operational Audits to identify where automation can save time and reduce costs.

We curated and indexed over 4,300+ production-ready n8n workflows into a searchable, high-performance platform. The platform uses SQLite FTS5 for sub-100ms search times across thousands of integrations.

Technical Architecture

  • Search Engine: Built with FastAPI and SQLite Full-Text Search (FTS5).
  • Automation Logic: Standardized n8n JSON formats covering over 360+ distinct services (Slack, Stripe, HubSpot, etc.).
  • CI/CD: Automated security audits (Trivy) and GitHub Actions deployments to GitHub Pages.
  • UI: Custom-built, lightweight frontend with Tailwind CSS and dark mode support.

Key Features

  • 4,000+ Workflows — Covering marketing, DevOps, sales, and more.
  • Instant Search — Find exact integrations in milliseconds.
  • One-Click Export — Download ready-to-import JSONs.
  • Fully Open — Community-driven contributions and support.

Results

  • Reduced dev time — Saves hundreds of hours for automation engineers.
  • High adoption — Starred and used by developers globally.
  • Low footprint — Runs efficiently with minimal resource consumption (<50MB RAM).

Tech Stack

n8n FastAPI SQLite Python Docker Tailwind CSS
